scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:preview: npm run build && firebase hosting:channel:deploy preview
scripts.hooks:setup: node -e "const cp = require('child_process'); const os = require('os'); const isWin = process.platform === 'win32'; const hasGitBash = isWin && (process.env.SHELL && process.env.SHELL.includes('bash')); const cmd = (isWin && !hasGitBash) ? 'powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File .githooks/setup.ps1' : (isWin ? 'bash .githooks/setup.sh' : 'chmod +x .githooks/setup.sh && ./.githooks/setup.sh'); try { cp.execSync(cmd, {stdio: 'inherit'}); } catch (e) { console.warn('Warning: Git hooks setup failed. This is OK if not using Git.'); }"
scripts.validate:commit: node -e "const msg = process.argv[1]; const regex = /^(feat|fix|docs|style|refactor|perf|test|chore|build|ci|revert)(\(.+\))?: .{1,50}/; if (!regex.test(msg)) { console.error('❌ Invalid commit format'); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('✅ Valid commit format'); }"
